DOC.brief_summary: In this study the investigators observe the investigation, whether the new method for Boost-Irradiation with the Intrabeam Device of Zeiss Germany influences local recurrence, acute and late effects of Radiotherapy, overall survival, quality of life and cosmesis.
DOC.brief_title: IORT-Boost-Study, Prospective Observational Study for Intraoperative Radiotherapy of the Breast as a Boost
DOC.criteria: women with histologically proven unifocal ductalinvasive or other histology of breastcancer, size of tumor < or = 3.5 cm written informed consent ability to cooperate full legal capability missing written informed consent lack of compliance
DOC.keyword: early and late effects of radiation
